channel.title: INtech
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from INtech, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Microsoft’s Satya Nadella is choosing chatbots over podcasts
item.description: While Microsoft CEO Satya Nadella says he likes podcasts, he might not actually be listening to them anymore. That tidbit comes towards the end of a l...

item.title: 5 Best Folding Phones (2025), Tested and Reviewed
item.description: Ready to move on from the traditional glass slab? Introduce a hinge into your life with these folding smartphones.

item.title: Epic Games asks judge to force Apple to approve Fortnite
item.description: Epic Games is escalating its efforts to pressure Apple to allow its game Fortnite into its App Store, with a new court filing asking Judge Yvonne Gonz...

item.title: 12 Best Sunscreens, WIRED Tested and Reviewed
item.description: We put 25 sunscreens to the test during summer hikes, spring ski days, and beach-side hangs. Out of all the mineral, chemical, and spray varieties we ...

item.title: MIT disavows doctoral student paper on AI’s productivity benefits
item.description: MIT says that due to concerns about the “integrity” of a high-profile paper about the effects of artificial intelligence on research and innovation, t...

item.title: TechCrunch Week in Review: Coinbase gets hacked
item.description: Welcome back to Week in Review! We’ve got tons of news for you this week, including a hack at Coinbase; YC thinks Google is a ‘monopolist’; layoffs at...

item.title: 9 Best Digital Notebooks, Tablets, and Smart Pens (2025)
item.description: These nifty tools combine the ease of jotting notes by hand with the power of saving them digitally.

item.title: Laser-powered fusion experiment more than doubles its power output
item.description: The U.S. Department of Energy’s National Ignition Facility increased the yield of the experiment in recent attempts.

item.title: How to Reduce Browser Battery Drain in Chrome, Edge, and Opera
item.description: Your browser can suck up a lot of battery life if you’re not careful. Tweak those settings to surf on your laptop longer.

item.title: 14 Best Subscription Boxes for Kids (2025): STEM, Books, Snacks
item.description: These monthly deliveries get kids coding and cooking while encouraging them to learn science and read about the world.
